    • appendInventory

      public boolean appendInventory​(Item item)
      Adds an item to the players inventory, if the player can handle the weight. Returns true if successfull, otherwise false.
      Parameters:
      item - a Item to be added to the players inventory.
      Returns:
      true if the item added false if the item is too heavy for the user, and thus can't be added.

    • dropItem

      public void dropItem​(int item)
      Drops item at index in inventory
      Parameters:
      item - Where in inventory the item should be removed.

    • getInventory

      public java.util.ArrayList<Item> getInventory()
      Returns:
      a list of Item the user is carrying. AKA the Inventory
